Here's a link to your very own copy of the Official Matrix Online Storybook AKA MxO: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5134114

After you get the CD's you may want to check out the Emulator info here:

http://www.mxoemu.info/forum/index.php

Please note that this is just the contents of the files and folders on each CD which are copied and pasted into the separate folders. There are no image files with this download. However, I was still able to install the game using this torrent.

To get the actual game CD's go here instead: http://mxoemu.info/forum/thread-17.html
They are 3 ISO image files provided by a Russian website that can either be burned to disc or mounted on a virtual drive. You will need a free virtual drive emulator such as Daemon tools lite if you want to mount the CD's instead of burning them to a disk. 

Also, the link to the emulator page has info regarding a private server that is currently being worked on. At the moment it is not fully complete, but you can still move around in the Matrix world.
